name: involved
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: involved
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: not simple and therefore difficult to understand

example.eg: The plot of the film was too involved - I couldn't understand it.
example.egtrans: 这部影片的情节过分复杂——我看不懂。

dsense.name: involved
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: being in a close relationship with someone

example.egtrans: 产生感情的／堕入情网的

example.eg: Try not to become too emotionally involved with the children in your care.
example.egtrans: 尽量不要对你所照顾的孩子过于牵肠挂肚。
